p: Concerning the stabilizing effect ( Table 4), the overall analyzed extracts exhibited considerable ( p < 0.001) stabilizing potential on the erythrocytes membrane. Parsley displayed the highest stabilizing effect (HT 50 = 301.24 min), while celery recorded the lowest effect (HT 50 = 228.53 min), which is higher compared to erythrocytes incubated without the extract (control) (HT 50 = 142.48 min).
